ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The school under the organization is the premier citadel of learning in the remote corner of south Bihar. Organization, participation, performance and achievement in Gyan Tarang and Vivek Tarang project of the society created excellent creative and innovative environment in the region. Plantation programme in the villages, cultural, art and sports activities and platforms for development of leadership quality and sense of service.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Being self finance organization, the school under the society are providing opportunity of education among the masses, the girl child and the needy people.
As a self finance organization, the society is running school which in many ways different from the others and have recognition in the district.

Society is running school in the name of Vivekanand Mission School, which is affiliated to CBSE upto +2 level. As and ATL school this unit of the society will contribute a lot in the promotion of Science &amp; Technology, Innovation and Creation, Skills and Exploration of new ideas in new ways.

The society is running school in the name of Vivekanand Mission School. In the Year 2019-20, the school under the society became ATL school. During the corona pandemic the school tried its level best to follow the guidelines of society, the, CBSE and the others and kept its students academically active. Webinars and workshops online have been provided to make the system effective and enter training.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: As a nation can be advanced in proportion as education and culture spread among the masses the organization is committed to train the younger generation through national education Gyan Tarang and Vivek Tarang programme played feverous role for the children and provided them Multidimensional platform as Talent Hunt Festival. Started in the 150th Birth Anniversary of swami Vivekanand through this platform the children availed ample opportunities to explore their hidden talents

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Self finance organization, Sources of finance in fee from students and members contribution. The society runs educational institutions only. Through the institutions the society work from the upliftment of the new generation by educating them. Apart from campus activities, the society excel socio-educational and cultural drives to make people aware about the national ideals of Renunciation and Service.
Self finance organization Runs its programmes only through the financial support received as fee from the students and contribution from the members.
The organization is a self finance unit which runs its projects of educational institutions on the fees from students and subscription from members.

The society runs its projects of educational institutions on the fees received from the students enrolled in the institutions. A grant for establishing Atal Tinkering Lab aiming at developing scientific tempers and innovative ideas of the students has been received from the Niti Aayog ( Atal Innovation Mission). This lab has been established in the unit Vivekanand Vision Ideal Public School, in the remote area of Aurangabad (Bihar). This ATL will provide innovative and creative ideas.

The society runs schools in the remote areas of Aurangabad (Bihar) on self finance basis. During the corona pandemic lockdown, the electronic and I.T System played effective role for the academic environment for the children at home. Webinars and workshops provided excellent environment for both the teachers & students. The organization is thankful to the CBSE and Niti Aayog for guidance and support.
